Edited August 1, 2018 by flying_chair
I was going to reply, but I took an arrow to the knee.
I was going to give you an arrow to the knee for this thread, but then I took an arrow to the knee.
I was going to complain about the unoriginality of this game, but then I took an arrow to the knee.
I was going to take an arrow to the knee, but then I took an arrow to the knee.
You used to be an adventurer like me, but then I took an arrow to the knee.
I used to wander the wilds, until I took an +Bronze Arrow+ to the knee(And an Elf to the face).
Didn\'t this meme die back in october?

Didn\'t this meme die back in october?

It did, but then it took an arrow to the knee

It did, but I don\'t think this thread will revive it any time soon.

Didn\'t this meme die back in october?

But Skyrim came out in November....

It did, but then it took an arrow to the knee

It did, but I don\'t think this thread will revive it any time soon.

Good point.

(Also, +200 internet kudos for the DF reference)

Can we change this to be slightly more original?

For example, I used to be a windows fanboy like you, but then I took a MacBook Pro to the knee.

I used to be a Kerbonaut like you, but then I took a booster to the knee.

(Btw, what is this from? Oblivion?)

Can we change this to be slightly more original?

For example, I used to be a windows fanboy like you, but then I took a MacBook Pro to the knee.

I used to be a Windows fanboy like you, but then I took a GNU to the knee.
I used to be spammers like you, but then i took a banhammer to the IP address.
I used to partake in these silly antics like you, but then I took a plate of common sense to the head.

I used to stretch images, but then I took a bowl of aesthetics to the brain.

[This is from Skyrim.]

I used to make assumptions on people, but then I took a slap to the face.

[ I am well aware of that ]
I used to have no common sense like you, but then I did nothing about it.

I used to be spammers like you, but then i took a banhammer to the IP address.

I used to use banhammers, but then I took an arrow to the knee.
I used to have a life, but then I took a computer to the face.
I used to have Kerbals, but then they took a Solid Rocket Booster to the face.
I used to be like you, but then I took an unoriginal meme to the computer screen.

I used to be an arrow in someones knee, but then I took a knee to the arrow.

;D
I used to sell knee protection, but then i took an arrow to the knee.
